headline: Charter: An Attractive Safe Haven Amidst Macro Uncertainty (Rating Upgrade)
summary: Charter Communications saw 35% share growth, driven by strategic M&A and strong mobile segment performance. Learn why CHTR stock is poised for 15% upside.
